name: TODCO
description: TODCO creates and maintains quality, low-income, senior and single-room-occupancy housing with accompanying recreational and social services to improve the South of Market community. TODCO owns eight buildings in the South of Market Area. Eligibility: For senior/low-income housing, must be at least 62 years of age or have a disability and be low-income; for SRO housing, must be at least 18 years of age and low-income; for family housing, must be disabled/all ages.
